channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: McDonald’s same-store sales fall for the 1st time since the pandemic, profit slides 12%
item.description: McDonald’s posted weak sales in the second quarter as increasingly value-conscious consumers paid fewer visits to restaurants.

item.title: USDA moves to limit salmonella in raw poultry products
item.description: Federal officials are moving to set new limits on salmonella in raw poultry products in the U.S. The Agriculture Department’s proposal is aimed at reducing the number of people who get sick.

item.title: Federal Reserve is edging closer to cutting rates. The question will soon be, how fast?
item.description: Two years after launching an aggressive fight against inflation and one year after leaving its benchmark interest rate at a near-quarter-century high, the Federal Reserve is expected to signal this week that it will likely reduce borrowing costs as soon as September.
